sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Typography, Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Colors from "../colors/colors"; const Board = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
0 3 6 9 12 15 18 21 24 27 30 33 36 2 to 1
2 5 8 11 14 17 20 23 26 29 32 35 2 to 1
1 4 7 10 13 16 19 22 25 28 31 34 2 to 1
1st 12 2nd 12 3rd 12
1 to 18 EVEN RED BLACK ODD 19 to 36
); }; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ container: { width: "90%", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", flexDirection: "row", justifyContent: "center", backgroundColor: Colors.white, borderRadius: "10px 10px 10px 10px", border: `.5rem solid ${Colors.black}`, padding: "2%", }, table: { width: "100%", }, tbody: { width: "100%", }, tr: { width: "100%", }, numberZero: { textAlign: "center", height: "5rem", fontSize: "5vh", color: Colors.white, fontFamily: ["Open-Sans", "sans-serif"].join(","), fontWeight: "bold", margin: "5%", backgroundColor: Colors.green, }, numberRed: { textAlign: "center", height: "5rem", fontSize: "5vh", color: Colors.white, fontFamily: ["Open-Sans", "sans-serif"].join(","), fontWeight: "bold", margin: "5%", backgroundColor: Colors.red, }, numberBlack: { textAlign: "center", height: "5rem", fontSize: "5vh", color: Colors.white, fontFamily: ["Open-Sans", "sans-serif"].join(","), fontWeight: "bold", margin: "5%", backgroundColor: Colors.black, }, sector: { textAlign: "center", height: "5rem", fontSize: "5vh", color: Colors.white, fontFamily: ["Open-Sans", "sans-serif"].join(","), fontWeight: "bold", margin: "5%", backgroundColor: Colors.green, } })); export default Board;
